CustomField.formula:
IF(
YEAR(TODAY())*10000+MONTH(TODAY())*100+DAY(TODAY()) < YEAR(TODAY())*10000+MONTH( Intended_Wedding_Date__c )*100+DAY( Intended_Wedding_Date__c ),
DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH( Intended_Wedding_Date__c ),DAY( Intended_Wedding_Date__c )),
DATE(YEAR(TODAY()+365),MONTH( Intended_Wedding_Date__c ),DAY( Intended_Wedding_Date__c ))
)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Date of couple's next wedding anniversary - depends on "Wedding Date (Expected)" field.
CustomField.label: Next Wedding Anniversary
